values:
every time something bad or startling happens, it's a "wakeup call" but the wakeup call lasts for about a week.. until the next bad thing happens, and then you're like "omg.. this is such a wakeup call. we should live our lives differently etc etc" and im mad at myself for being guilty of never actually "waking up" and changing things. like, right now.. i want to say that if i had another chance, i'd do everything differently.. but im afraid i might only be saying that because of what just happened and not because i'll actually change anything. i want to change things, but i get so wrapped up in my stupid, meaningless activities that i forget and i hate it. fix meee, fix the human race.

did that make any sense?

I feel like the list of things to do is never-ending, and it doesn't matter if I procrastinate or get things done right away... because as soon as i finish one thing, it's onto the next. and even while i'm procrastinating, i'm stressed because i know eventually i have to do things. gahhhh between school and college and scholarships and online classes and friends and everything else in my life i'm just so done. im so ready for summer, i can't even explain. but even then, i feel like i'm going to be juggling 8927349837 things at once. work, lake shore park, gilford, college, etc. etc. etc. and i'm on vacation, so you would think it'd be a good break? but no. no no no. today and yesterday were spent doing a fourth of the homework my insane teacher assigned us for over vacation. why did i take calculus? no one can really say. i hate television. even if theres nothing on tv... i end up watching some stupid show that means nothing to me, instead of doing things that i need to do. then 2 hours go by and i'm like, damnit! you know what else i hate? boredom. because i somehow manage to find time to be bored (thats where procrastinating comes in) and when i'm bored i eat.. a LOT, lol. so far this vacation i feel like not ten minutes have gone by where i haven't been munching on something. 

want to know what i watched on tv today? probably not, but i'll write it down anyway... repeating sessions of backtoback full house, a repeat of the oscars on E, backtoback sabrina the teenage witch, grounded for life, you've got mail, and now i'm watching some lifetime movie that actually is really good. but honestly, i have so much to do... why am i addicted to such pointless things?

i miss my friends. everyones so busy and so into what they're doing lately that we haven't had time to hang out as a group much. i see everyone individually but i just want to have a day/night to be with everyone. 

this year has gone by so fast, maybe thats why i feel so behind on everything. i keep thinking i have a lot of time to do things, but time is rapidly sweeping away. seriously, it's about to be MARCH, the month where i turn 18! just yesterday it was christmas. and about a week ago it was summer. so basically in like a day, i'll be graduating from high school... what!? this year is SO fast, yet so much has happened. i mean, every year is always fast.. but this one especially so. does anyone agree? maybe i'm just insane. 

i guess i'm done. i just felt like typing :-]
i dont think anyone really reads this anymore anywayssss

bye!

so you know when you forget how much you love people? like, you don't really forget you kind of just don't think about it for a while... then you see a picture or read an old note/message and you're like "wow i really love them. i miss them. that person is amazing". yeah that happened to me tonight.. when i was looking at people's old livejournal entries/comments. and i rememebered how much i miss reading the thoughts of shaylan skye :-( and i wanttt to dedicate this to her (even though she probably won't read it) because i miss her so much, and she is SUCH an amazing, genuine friend. And two summers with her basically changed my life... not entirely because i'm still as lame as i always was... BUT in ways that only she would understand :) and i just love her, and feel the need to tell the world<3. PLUS, i think my most romantic moments have been with that girl.. i mean, have you ever broken in to a pirate's cove golfcourse in winter under a BRILLIANT starry sky and full moon? I have :-)

anyways, now that i've unraveled how much I love my bumblebee.. I guess I should get ready for bed. I have a really big math test tomorrow that i didn't really study for. but i'm soooo fed up with that class, and i'm at the point where i don't understand ANYTHING. and i COULD have gone to bed early tonight for the first time all week, but of course i thought it'd be a good idea to go on here and be on the internet for an hour? im really cool.

but anyways, although i could write in here forever i'm quite positive the world doesn't want to hear it, SO goodbye & goodnight<3

soooo it's been like two years since I've been on this thing.. 
but i randomly decided to look at it and i read through some of my old (and extremely lame) journal entries and i kinda miss writing in this thing. 

SO, im back. maybe. if i dont forget :p

but anyways nothings really new in my life that i want to write about.. i mean a lot's going on but.. yeah. maybe i'll think of something later

just thought itd be cool to post something :)

<33333

k...so this entry might not mke sense becuse my "ey" key isnt working so its going to be retrded. do you kno hy my "ey" nd sometimes "double U" keys rent orking? my mom spilled coffee on my keybord!!!! :-(

nywy... schools out!!! woooooo! but it doesnt feel like summer yet cuz..tody ws the first dy of nice wether, nd idk for some reson i feel like i still hve to go to school...oh it i do! i hve to go to school @ 8 tomorrow morning for 2 friggen hours of mth....blhhhhh

fridy fter school everyone went to pige's nd it ws fun but it ws kind riny out... i left for n hour for my first driving hour ith mrs. lndroche! it was good though... who my "ey" key just orked! sorry,.... but yeh sen s my observer nd it ws kind fun...is tht weird? then i went bck to piges nd it ws pretty fun. me nd lur spent the night but i fell sleep @ like 1. 

sturdy ws mnds 16th bdy prty!!!! ti ws fun... we dnced like idiots, te food, wtched the shining, nd me nd shley were up tlking til like 5 in the morning... 0:-) 

then yesterdy s fthers dy nd i spent the dy with my dd/grndfther...cme home to my cousin sitting in my bed...nd it ws so scry cuz im frid of ppl just like, entering my room nd i didnt relize it ws her...yeh i scremed. so she spent the night cuz she hd to work this morning. tht ws fun... then tody me nd mtt hung out t lsp, sw everyone t big pier for  while, then ent bck to his house. It ws fun :) <3

nd i wnt to write more but you cnt relly decipher ht im sying nd im tired.

Night!

ok, I was tagged by and now I have to pick my current 6 fav songs:

1. Incomplete -backstreet boys :P

2. Livin' on a Prayer -bon jovi

3. You and Me -Lifehouse

4. In this Diary -Ataris

5. Wake me up when september ends -greenday

6. Live Like you were Dying

k so im not quite sure if those are my FAVORITES, but im tired and i dont feel like thinking...so there are some that i like :)

I'm tagging

DO IT!

welll...i havent updated in forever. vacation was fun, hung out with people, Greenday= AMAZING, and i just basically relaxed/hung out. :)

Last night Matt, Pat, Paige, AJ, Lauren, Dave, Shay, Kris, and Sara came over for "movie night"! ..hope i didnt forget anybody. It was really fun..we watched Jackass, which was hilarious (ive never seen it before). then the boys wrestled..then we all ran around outside but didnt get any ticks! :P me, shay, and paige figured out how to roll down the hill connected to eachother..it was SO COOL! andddd after like, hours of being crazy we went back inside and pretty much crashed. Kris left at 9:30, Matt left at 12, and everyone else left around 1. except sara stayed til 2 and talked with me, paige, and lauren :). Laur and Paige stayed over for the first P night in FOREVER, and it was so awesome. We talked for hours... and everything felt so right again, it was really nice. Then we went to pull out the bed for the pull-out sofa, but we couldnt because DAVE BROKE IT!!!!!! so its 5 in the morning, and we decide to make a bed out of couch cusions and build a sheet fort :D it was SO FUNNNN! i love forts! Eventually we fell asleep, i'm so glad we hung out last night.. it was much needed and i love them so much. laur left at 9 this morning for voice lessons, and paige and i woke up at 12..then her mom came. so last night was really fun :) I'm sorry if you're mad at me cuz you "werent invited" honestly, it started out with 4 people then it just kindof expanded...because things have a way of doing that. Anyone was welcome to come, i wasnt trying to leave anyone out. Sorry :/. 

annnnyyyyway, the Germans come back today! woohooo! I'm so busy this month... it's so crazy. And Prom's in 3 weeks?!?! IM not ready :P whatever... we'll get there. 

ive been working on my drivers ed project all day, and its really getting boring. I'm so bored, i really wanna do something tonight, like see a movie or something.

Mothers day tomorrow, i have no gifts ... hopefully i can come up with something tonight. 

LOVE AND LOVE AND HAPPY AFTERNOONS :-*

Well it's 9:00 and i haven't even eaten dinner yet. Lol. Today felt really long...and i was so tired. i got out of my bio test 6th period for a forum meeting though!! woo.. but i have to retake it now. I started Driver's Ed today, i feel like it's going to be sooooo much work before i get my liscence. blahh. After dr. ed, sara picked me up and we went tanning... then me and mom went for a drive. i was really disappointed cuz i wanted to work at guiseppie's but you have to be 18 to waitress, i could be a bus*girl* if i wanted. i have no idea where to work this summer. ideas anyone? Anyway i gotta go finish hw and hopefully eat soon... Night!

I feel better today, I'm happy :) 
I realize that not everything is in my power to fix...so i'm gonna stop stressing. because its not enough that i want this to work, you have to want it too.

<3xoxo<3

I was talking to mom last night, and she told me to stop worrying about the future because random unexpected things always come up, and things may go completely different from the way you think they will. but i can't get myself to stop focusing on these issues, what she said did make sense though. 

Today I was looking at pictures, and they made me so sad. I don't understand why I still feel this way and why lately its stressing me so much. but its all i can think about. :-(

enough with that, heres my day:
-French we played a review game and i guess i was having a dumb morning because everything i said/did was retarded. lol
-English me aaron and dj were distracted the entire time. drawing pictures and stuff...lol
-Math sucked. I hate that class.
-GYm we walked a mile and a half. and we walked up in the H's and we went by jasmines house. It made me soooo incredibly sad, I miss her so much :/
-Euro sucked. I cna't focus inthat class.
-Lunch was pretty good. I ate something healthy today! woo
-Bio we watched a movie...for TWO periods cuz it was lab day. omg i was so sleepy.
-Chorus was boring.
-After school we had a meeting for festival then rehersal. me and paige are co-hosting and co-foruming! WOO im kindof excited!!

I think I'm going to make my journal friends only.

I am so sick of things. trying to work through the same things over and over again is exhausting. but whatever..

today was okay. Shaylan and AJ gave me a little poster thing and it made me soooo happy. I love them so much :) <3

I know, this is a pointless entry. I just wanted to point out how much i love my friends <333 

'night!

no one comments anymore :-( lol, but i still like updating...

-when i woke up this morning i was So exhausted, I don't know how i got out of bed.
-French- we were so easily distracted and not focused today. it was awful, lol. james drew on my back with a pen, and so i threw his water bottle, which got a hole in it. so then we tried to cover up the hole with tape, whcih just made a mess. then james threw watery towels in sara's backpack and she was pissed...they almost got detention. ohhh man, the things we do early in the morning :-P
-English-I could barely stay awake in english because we just talked about the book, and i was so incredibly tired. 
-Math- Mr. Wool wasn't in school today!!!!!!!!!!!!!! so i went to the caf for a few minutes to talk to paige pat and aj, and i borrowed aj's mathbook. went back to class, did the bookwork, went back to the caf to give aj his book back and talk some more. :-)
-Gym- we did workout videos again. we did this "step" thing and i like couldtn do it because i was so exhausted. also because i'm pathetic. then when we did the ab workout thing, i almost fell asleep listening to the lady's voice.
-Euro- omg boring.
-Lunch- connor was in our lunch today! :-D it was fun..
-Bio- omg boring.
-design- i like perspective.
-chorus- omg boring, except i drew ash a really pretty pic :). 
-after school we had a class meeting, i dont think many people went. i didn't. me, paige, pat, and matt went to concord today for tuxes. it was fun...then we went to toys r us! anddd yeah it was a pretty fun afternoon. 
I'm still so exhausted, blahh. 

and i feel really anxious/nervous.. but i have no idea why.
i'm such a freak.

<333

Today was exhausting. The first half of the day felt like i was in a dream, just thoughtlessly going through each motion. It was terrible. It got progressively better... but im still wicked tired. ummm in gym we had to do those workout videos and i was SO not in the mood. i like, could barely stand up. haha, im so pathetic. i had 2 quizzes today but both of them were really easy. Then after school we had a sort of rehersal. we read lines and threw the pillows at eachother. ti was actually pretty fun :-P thennnnn we found out that me and patrick no longer have a booth anymore! :-( but yeah rehersal was fun, then i talked to maggs and cass for a little bit... went driving with mom. the rest of my night was pretty boring. 

this is a pointless update.

so i just typed an entire friggen entry about my wonderful weekend and my retarded computer erased it?! god knows how... all i did was press UPDATE. EFFINNNNNNNNN A! ughhhhhhhhh i hate it when it does this, and now i have to retype the whole thing over again and im SO PISSED. GAH, anyway...
i had a really awesome weekend. yesterday (saturday) was rennie's birthday, and we all went to the soda shoppe at 1:45 to celebrate! and becca made really nasty brownies, haha but its the thought that counts :). After lunch, me, shay, connor, and lizi went to strawberrie's (i got the who) and walmart for cast gifts for dave. Then i came home, played guitar and stuff for a while, and went to the school at 7 for closing night!! closing night went really well, my uncle and grandparents came. patrick was hilarious, and i came very close to laughing several times. ohhh man.. it was fun. And then we only had to strike/clean up til like 10!! it was SO awesome! and then we had the first cast party in the caf, and it was pretty fun. we got chinese food and cakessss and senior toasts :(. anyway, we left the school earlier than we've ever left! usually we dont leave til like 1, but we got out i think around 11 or so. im not sure but it was pretty early. Then everyone went to connor's house for the cast party. it was so much fun, a lot of people had to leave at 1 but then the rest of us stayed over. it was tons and tons of fun, some interesting stuff happened, but it was fun. we lost an hour of sleep though because of daylight savings time, which sucked. I got absolutely no sleep last night, and i'm so exhausted. This morning me, kristyn, pat, paige, and matt left around 11:30 i think? i dont really remember.. but we left and we had to bring kristyn to her house then to laconia. so we brought her to her house,and as we're leaving we got stuck in her driveway... mud and all. It was bad, and the tension was already high enough since none of us got any sleep last night. so we called Tripple A and it took them an hour to get there. but we were okay.. we hung out and matt and i walked down to the store to get food. then when they finally came and unstuck us, we brought kristyn to laconia, went to dairy queen, went to pat's to get movies, and went to paige's to watch lord of the rings. that movie is like 800 hours long, but it's okay becuase we all like, passed out as soon as we layed down anyway. We left around 5:50 and im soooo exhausted. I feel like i got a total of 2 hours sleep, if that. and i have so much homework and stuff to do. blah. but it was a really fun weekend, and i have tons of pictures but i lost my camera at connor's. if anyone took it accidentally, lemme know cuz im like having a breakdown. 
this was the senior's last cast party :( 
I'm exhausted. <3

well... today was good. dont remember much of it. oh yeah, mom let me sleep in a little bit cuz i was up late last night with homework. so i went in at the end of 2nd period, and saw shay and jamie on my way in :). thennn i was in a good mood for most of the day, except at the end. im not quite sure why, i had the blues :P. oh yeah and in gym class today we did darrin's dance grooves, HA! it's like i'm as good as NSYNC now! anyway... shay brought me home after school and i spent the entire afternoon playing guitar/being on the computer. it was reallllly nice to be home. Call was at 7, and as always we were crazy and danced around.. it was fun. the show went really well tonight, tomorrows closing night!! but thennnn we get to perform it again at STATES! woo! anyway, after the show i went to dunks with shay, dave, and connor. connor left around 11ish i think, and we stayed there til like, 12:15ish. and now im here at home :) but i really wanna go finish the book im reading, ive had it since florida and its really good but i never have time to read it. and now i do. Rens birthday is tomorrow, ow ow ow ow :-*

'Night!<3

ps. MEG came to see the show tonight!!!!!!!!! :D :D :D :D :D

today was really fun. ummm the actual day is kindof a blur... but afterschool i hung out with shay<3. we went to DQ with cass and chels, then me and shay went to downtown laconia and walked around- bought some candy and looked in greenlaw's and dollar store, lol cuz we're cool. then we went to the school to get my stuff, went for a drive, got really confused and almost got lost but didn't!, then she dropped me off at home. I love her. hung out at home for a while and got nothing productive done whatsoever, then had to go back to the school at 7 because it was opening night tonight! so while the other show was going on, we were soooo hyper...at least i was :P. and me and nick were laughing at EVERYTHING, haha it was awesome... i love him :) the show was okay, we've done better. and i felt kinda off tonight. ehh, oh well. didnt get home til late, and now i need to go finish some stuff, 'night<3.


Jesus, I pray
Take all my mistakes
Throw them away
Destroy them for my sake

Jesus, I call out 'cause I'm sorry
Because I fall so short of your glory
To the best of my ability
I'm practicing humility
And I lay myself before
'Cause less is more

-I love that song<3

today was awesome!!!! i'll go through the day, lol.. before school i went down to the PAD and i love everyone so much. and paige gave me presents!! she made me the most be-a-u-tiful purse :) and got me the Nine Days cd!! then we walked up to french, where they sang happy birthday in French... it was.... amazing :). lol, then the rest of the day is kindof a blurr...haha I was in such a good mood all day. and tons of people gave me cards and stuff. thennnnn after school the stcyr's threw me a birthday party!!! so matt said he couldn't go because he had track... so after school pat drove me and paige to her house and pat was like "yeah we have a present for you in the trunk" so i open the trunk, and matt's in there... haha it was great. i love my friends so much<3 anyway the party was fun, we just hung out and walked around and watched movies and stuff. And i got a bunch of cool stuff from a bunch of cool people :) and AJ drew me a picture of my "10 best friends" :-D which explains why he called me the other night "because he was doing a project for statistics and needed to know my 10 best friends" haha... yeah of course i fell for that one. goshhhh my friends are such good schemers! lol... then went back to the school cuz we had a show!!! it went pretty good... it was the best old people show we've ever done! they laughed at like, everything. Anyway i had a really good day, then my parents and i had cake and icecream, and they gave me the tailor guitar plug in!!!!!!!!!! ahhhhhh im soooooo psyched :-D! AND then my cousin called, and we have Greenday tickets for the 29th!!!! I'm SO excited! wooooooooo yeah birthdays!

so anyway, today was amazing... I love you guys so much :D <3 :-*

woooooooo! im in a good mood :)
today was okay i guess. ummmmmm in gym we did an intense ABB workout...is that how you spell abb? or is it ab? anyway, it was intense me and connor like died. and then we did YOGA. yeah yoga! i miss my yoga girls... anywho, that was a good time. after school lauren and i walked to my house because it was soooo nice out and i love spring!! so we got to talk for a while, and it was wicked cool :) then paige came just as laur was leaving :( so paige left and the rest of my evening was spent driving around with mum... i was going to go to youth group, but then i decided not to cuz i had to much to do. i really wanted to though, i miss it. that's about all that went on todya....its my last day of being 15! lol, just thought i'd let the world know<3

'night!

Things have been hard lately. It doesn't seem like it, but im just so tired of everything always being so hard and confusing. But I think tonight I realized that maybe the one thing i need is something that I've been pushing aside for a while now. And I'm really glad I found it again, because i want to work so hard to bring it back. 'cause when i have that foundation, everything around me is okay...and i can work through all the hard stuff. 

and i think right now i feel okay for the first time in a while. :)

SO I realized that I use this thing way too much when all of my friends started talking to me about things I never told them about, and everyone knows everything before i tell them because of this stupid livejournal! lol, however i plan to still continue my silly updates...because they make me happy :)

anyway.... Easter was good. went to boston with my uncle for champions on ice, which was amazing as always. we talked all the way down... and it was relaly good to catch up and stuff. I love him <3. then today was pretty good too. Patrick and Paige are dating! <3 congradulations to them! andddd after rehersal i went to sara's to cook food for french, and jenna and beckah were there. i havent seen them in so long. And i've been home doing stuff... and thats all im gonna tell you cuz im sick of you guys knowing everything i'm going to tell you before i say it!!!! lol, but i still love you :)

ps. I talked to Jasmine tonight, and I love her so much. <3 and i miss her a lot.

'Night!

pss. what does exanimate mean?

so last night i was sick, and i missed out on the all girls night with paige, laur, and maggs... i was so disappointed! but we're gonna do it again sometime and hopefully i wont be sick then, lol. So last night me and mom rented movies and it was nice. i fell asleep at like 9:30 on the couch in my clothes... which is really weird for me. But i was really sick. By the way... Vanity Fair and Before Sunset are two really good movies. Then today we had rehersal at 1 and potluck dinner at 4:30... then i came home and wrote my English Essay in under an hour!!!!! SO impressed.

Then I hung out with Shay!!!!!! :-D I love her SO much! She came over and i showed her my prom dress :), then we started driving around spontaneously choosing which way to go. Eventually we decided to go to Border's and Taco Bell in Concord. So the best part of the night had to be just talking to shay in the car and just hanging otu with her. it was so much fun and we had a lot of catching up to do since we havent hung out in like 8 years. So we got to Borders and looked at CD's and other cool stuff... and we bought root beers, which ended up to be a disaster...but i'll get to that. so anyway, shaylan bought me an ISPY birthday present and im wicked excited, even though I can't have it til wednesday :P. Then we left Borders, and I managed to spill root beer alllll over the car. I know, you can't take me anywhere. and it got all over my stuff too, lol. But hey- it's okay! Then we went to taco bell cuz ive never been before!! and Shay took me for the FIRST time :D. it was soooooo good, and the guy there was totally hitting on us ;). and we got tons of napkins which we then used to clean up the mess. OH AND i got a free meal!!!! cuz the guy screwed up the order, yessss! it rocked! oh yeah and shay was telling me how the taco bell in concord was combined with a fish place, and so i thought there were gonna be like fish tanks and stuff inside... yeah it was a fish restaurant. my bad. i was very disapponted ;). And thennnnn we listened to really funny music and i liked it hahhaa, and we talked some more. then we went to the office because the entire WORLD was there! That was pretty fun, we havent gone there since the beginning of this year. Then people started getting in oxygen fights... you know those cans with the pressurized oxygen. it burns so bad! and we're all going to die tomororw because the warning said excessive inhalation can be fatal. I'm pretty sure we used up at least 3 cans. oh the things that amuse us. I got home at like 11 and i'm going to bed soon because tomorrow im going to boston with my uncle to see champions on ice!!! for my birthday. i'm so excited :) AND it's easter! happy early easter! actually.. its almost twelve now so i might as well say happy easter. ANyway tonight was really really fun and i love shaylan so much <33333333333

 

ps. we didnt inhale the cans (just so you know) we were simply spraying them...lol.

Goodnight!

ps. sorry for the over-detailed entry. :)

so i realized that all of my entries lately have been rather depressing, sorry. I can't help it... that seems to be the new thing these days. Anyway, this week wasn't very good... at all. But it had it's highlights.
-Sunday my family won a wicked nice plug in tailor guitar from guiseppie's!!! it was so sweet
-Monday was terrible. Then Patrick and Matt took me and Paige out to burger King, and we got crowns and cool toys. We were going to go to water arobics, but we werent really in the mood. so we went to pat's house with aj and watched ladder 49. the boys thought it was the saddest movie ever, but me and paige didnt really think so... and we were kinda disappointed cuz we were looking forward to a good movie cry.
-tuesday was terrible too. I don't remember much about it. i think that was the day patrick took me home and i couldn't find my key. so then i had to go back to the school, but i saw kris callahan for like a minute. then i got my whole outline done. then that night me and brian talked for like an hour and a half. it was good to talk to him, i miss him and everyone from summer.
-Wednesday sucked aswell. really sucked. Then after school we had a lovely's meeting but it was short. i dont remember anything about the rest of my night. OH YEAH! me patrick and aj went to paige's to see her lovely prom dress selection, and the one she picked is very beautifullll. then we met dave laur m and maggie at the gstock inn for WATER AROBICS!!! hahahahaha it had to be the highlight of my week. then i came home, decided not to do my hw, and watched a cute movie with mom but she fell asleep. 
-thursday also sucked. but in gym we did a workout video, and then i came home and ran a mile and a quarter. i also called lauren, and i'm glad i did.
-friday (today) was okay. i'm sick though :( and im really worried that i wont be better before the shows next week. that would suckkkk. today in gym we did TAE BOE. it was pretty cool.... im into the whole excercise thing lately, lol but im so sore. 

So I'm kind of annoyed for various reasons... but whatever I'll get over it. 

I'm hanging out with shaylan tomorrow night!!!! :-D

im so busy this weekend... we have rehersal tomorrow at 1, and sunday is easter and im going to boston with my uncle for the day for my birthday :) an di have to write an essay for english. blahh im wicked stressed. And we have 3 shows next week.  WOO 

but im gonna go. hope you appreciate the long awaited update<3

wanna know what I miss? -I miss having the world at my feet, my head on straight, my feelings all sorted out. -I miss all the people that I have drifted away from, or been pulled away from. -I miss knowing that no matter what happened, everything was gonna be okay because I had faith that would bring me through anything. -I miss feeling like I was on the top of the world, because I found the best thing anyone could ever have- and there was enough love to overcome anything. -I miss the way I used to feel like everything was perfect. -I miss sitting in the hot tub talking about everything under the sun. -I miss going online and making you mad because we were gonna tell everyone all of your secrets. -I miss waking up to a plastic knife in my face and a really creepy look -I miss sitting down talking about things that no one should talk about, and then writing them all down so we wouldn't forget. -I miss being able to work out anything. -I miss being known for what was so good. -I miss making up stupid songs and playing board games at 3 in the morning (that we couldn't find the directions to so we made our own.) -I miss going for walks in the pouring rain just to talk about how stupid boys are. -I miss going to the mall and wanting to buy all the same things. -I miss finishing eachother's sentences. -I miss the first night we were ever all together, and we talked about everything. THat was at your house. -I miss walking to the golf course, scared that we'd get eaten by a bear. -I miss not being able to do anything if it wasn't together. -I miss liking the same boys, even though all of us knew none of us could get them. -I miss sitting in our stairwell talking about how it was our home. -I miss emailing eachother about EVERYTHING, even stuff none of us cared about. -I miss church on sundays and youth group on tuesdays. -I miss being online and telling everyone that we were lesbians, even though we weren't. -I miss going to bed in the middle of a conversation- and picking up where we left off in the morning. -I miss running in the woods and getting COVERED in mosquito bites. -I miss eating tons and tons of popsicles- because they had no calories. -I miss walking 082347 miles to your house at night, talking about how we were probably going to get raped- then sitting on a rock and talking about how we didn't need boys because we had eachother. -I miss talking about prom, and planning out EVERYTHING. -I miss knowing exactly what you're thinking. -I miss the way we used to be. -I miss talking about EVERYONE, then saying how upset we were that someone was talking about us. -I miss the stupid things. -I miss the feeling we used to get when we were all together. -I miss being "a unit" -I miss going to the bathroom together. -I miss sharing our faith. -I miss how we were the most important thing, and we didn't have to say it because we knew. -I miss the first time you admitted that it was real. -I miss 3way phone calls and chatrooms. -I miss the smiles i see in all the pictures. -I miss "speaking in tongues". -I miss being sure that we'd work it out. -I miss the list of 10 things that could possibly be wrong wtih your guy. -I miss the triangle. -I miss everything. -I miss us. -I miss last year. this is probably the most pathetic entry i have ever written. I'll probably end up deleting it. :(

snow day today!!!! which is awesome cuz i wanted it sooo bad. i got my computer back!!! lol, i know a day doesnt seem very long, but trust me.. it was!so todya is going to be a day of doing nothing and enjoying my computer :) andddd i love just being home by myself. 

i havent done one of these in a while:

-I never understood the expression "holy shit"
-Time amazes me- and i love and hate it at the same time.
-I have never met a nonhypocritical person.
-What purpose do alligators serve in the world? besides boots and purses..
-I think there is a type of music for every emotion.
-I hate the expression "everything happens for a reason."
-Eyes are wicked cool. I think they're the coolest part of a person. Think about everything that has been seen through someone's eyes. its so cool!
-I love pictures, and I love how they can capture a single moment or emotion.
-Pineapple icecream is soooooo good.
-I hate regret- if you did something, you must have had a reason to do it at that moment, and if you hadn't done it you probably would have regretted THAT. However, I always regret things... but i love this quote: "Never regret what once made you smile".
-I'm a wicked romantic- it's bad.
-I often look back and want what i HAD.
-I'm scared of the future, but sometimes excited.
-I've never been to Mexico, or anywhere out of the country.
-I saw my first alligator this year!
-I hate it when people are misleading.
-I don't like it when people are fake, but i probably do it too sometimes..
-Discuss your opinions with me, but don't force them on me.
-It really confuses me that there are so many religions in the world- and everyone believes their religion is true. so how do we really know which one is true? or do they all eventually come down to the same thing, only with different names? and why is EVERYONE so sure of their religion? why are there so many if only one is true? -and then i think about it too much and just forget about it.
-Time goes too quickly.
-Spring is my favorite season.
-Alligators are a lot like dinosaurs. it's kinda creepy.
-Life is really complicated, especially lately. Is it just me?
-I odn't want to get out of high school. It's comforting to know what you're doing each day... but I do want to move on with my life, it's just kinda scary.


okay, im done. Oh yeah and i liked this quote that my dad gave me too:

"Our deepest fear is not that we are inadequate. Our deepest fear is that we are powerful beyond measure. It is our light, not our darkness that most frightens us. We ask ourselves, who am I to be brilliant, gorgeous, talented, fabulous? Actually, who are you not to be? You are a child of God. Your playing small does not serve the world. There is nothing enlightened about shrinking so that other people won't feel insecure around you. We are all meant to shine, as children do. We were born to make manifest the glory of God that is within us. It is not just in some of us; it is in everyone. And as we let our own light shind, we unconsciously give other people permission to do the same. As we are liberated from our own fear, our presence automatically liberates others." -coach carter

ok, now im really done :) Bye!

Today was soooooo incredibly nice. we spent the entire day down at the beach. i dotn even think i got burned! ...yet. we went in a bunch of the shops, and some creepy guy was like trying to get me to let him give me a tatoo...it was so sketch. oh yeah and at this art show the other day, this old guy was hitting on my nana! it was SO weird. anyway... today was wicked awesome, went into some shops and stuff too... i don't know how i am going to leave this for snow. ew.
